-- | Dynamic configurable warp HTTP server
--   
--   Dynamic configurable warp HTTP server
@package warp-dynamic
@version 0.1.0

module Network.Wai.Application.Dynamic

-- | HTTP config
data Config
Config :: Settings -> Application -> Config

-- | Warp settings
warpSettings :: Config -> Settings

-- | Application to serve
application :: Config -> Application

-- | dynamic warp app
warpd :: Config -> IO ()

-- | The default value for this type.
def :: Default a => a

-- | Null application (always returns 404)
nullApp :: Application
instance Default Config
